articles.content: Charl Schwartzel has pocketed £3.86 million, golf's biggest ever prize pot, after winning the controversial Saudi-backed LIV golf tournament - as players have faced renewed backlash from a 9/11 victi… [+5930 chars]

articles.author: Rob Draper, Peter Allen
articles.title: There IS footage of the blunders from Paris police in the Champions League final chaos - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY ROB DRAPER AND PETER ALLEN: The Mail on Sunday can reveal that France's main rail operator SNCF kept all of their video footage from the day of the final.
articles.content: UEFA are understood to be incredulous that the vital CCTV footage at the Stade de France, which could have shed light on alleged police ineptitude in organising Liverpool's Champions League final, ha… [+6002 chars]
